Description: Four fragments of a dark brown human hair string used as binding. The string consists of 3 's'-spun elements, 'z'-plied.
Bibliographic references: Adams et al 1999 / Kulubnarti III: The Cemeteries (p. 60, 66)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Donated by: W S Webb Museum of Anthropology (University of Kentucky)
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: 93.1.199B (excavation object cat. no.)
Conservation: Photograph, document and prepare for storage and study as agreed by the British Museum and University of Glasgow: 01 Aug 2017
